q: WINDSOR, Ontario- Chrysler is debating the future of its minivans even as it starts making the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. We need to completely rethink the minivan, CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made.`` We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile.'' I think he's the clear front-runner, and I think the race is his if he chooses to accept it, Jackie Walorski said.`` I think he'd clear the field.'' . Kirsten Gillibrand said she was holding Gabrielle Giffords ' left hand when she started to feel it move. Gabrielle Giffords squeezed the senator's hand, then rubbed her hand with her thumb. We knew she could hear and understand what we were saying, Kirsten Gillibrand told reporters traveling back to Washington with the Barack Obama Thursday morning. '' again, Betty White quips,`` I think you do a thing once and then you run like a thief.'' David Letterman then asks her what she does in her free time and Betty White says, Oh, I like to do most anything. Play with animals, mostly. And vodka's kind of a hobby. So David Letterman reaches down from behind the desk and produces a bottle of Grey Goose, to which Betty White laughs heartily. They share some vodka, then she does a classic spit-take.
